identified_features.reasoning: Two through holes on the top surface.
A step is present at the junction of the base and the protruding section.
Three circular pockets are present, one near each corner of the base and one in the center.
A chamfer is visible on the edge of the base.
Three fillets are present, two on the corners and one on the side of the protruding section.
A threaded feature is present in the center of the base.
Two bosses are present, one near each corner of the base.
A freeform depression is present in the center of the base.
